title: Water Quality Parameter and Coal Emissions

content.question: A researcher wants to determine if ponds and lakes downwind of a coal-burning power plant are affected by the plant’s emissions. Which of the following would be the best parameter from the water in the ponds and lakes to measure in order to determine the effect of the plant’s emissions on the aquatic ecosystems?

choices.label: Biological oxygen demand (<math alttext="B O D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BOD</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>)
Volatile organic compounds (<math alttext="V O Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>VOCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>)

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
